subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Ray Allen scored 21 points, Rajon Rondo matched a season high with 18, and the visiting Boston Celtics continued their torrid pace by holding off the Chicago Bulls, 92-81, Saturday night.
snippet: Ray Allen scored 21 points, Rajon Rondo matched a season high with 18, and the visiting Boston Celtics continued their torrid pace by holding off the Chicago Bulls, 92-81, Saturday night.
